name: Knot
description: For lovers of burr and block puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® XP Processor: 2.0+ GHz Dual-Core Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 10 (or higher) Processor: 3.0+ GHz Multi-Core Processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 (or better) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
